comment: The class is simple.  One Midterm. One Paper. A final. and a couple of quizzes.  You have to read every assignment and there are a good bit of them.  I am a biology major, so I really did not enjoy the content of this class.  He also grades the one paper harshly.  I felt I did very well, along with people in the writing center, yet I got an 80...

This class is not hard as everyone says. BUT YOU HAVE TO READ THE ASSIGNED STUFF. He will give you quizzes but he tells you when they are. Usually 5 questions you do a short answer. And you have to come to class. He gives you exactly what you need to know for midterm and final. Grades: Midterm, Final, quiz grades, 500 word paper, and participation.

I really enjoyed him. He is funny and the class may be a bore sometimes but it was easy. He did your final grade based on 4 things. The midterm and final he told you EXACTLY what to expect. The 1 paper you were supposed to write is tricky but he grades fair. And you only take like 5 quizzes that are straight from the stories. Easy A.

this guy is so freaking hilarious, reminds me of Boss Hog from the Dukes of Hazard. you get 5 missed classes and as long as you only miss 5 he drops the lowest 2 quiz grades. quizzes are straight from the text and test are straight from the lecture...fun and easy class for sure.

flips out if you come in 30 sec late or if you ask a question. quizes are easy if you read the material but midterm,final and paper are opinion based and he is SUPER critical and flat RUDE with his comments on your work. He has a PHD in Literature and he expects and teaches like eveyone else has one too. DO NOT TAKE!!!!!

He didn't ramble on, whatever he talked about was relevant to the main point he talked about. It was never just a random conversation; there was always a point to it. He can be a bit snappy but I found that to be endearing. Just read the given assignments and listen to his lectures and you'll do fine. Plus he tell's you when the quizzes are coming

I don't know why there are so many negative ratings for this professor. The class was interesting and he had you read important pieces of literature. IF YOU READ WHAT HE ASSIGNS YOU'LL HAVE NO PROBLEM IN THIS CLASS.He hates it when people come in late so don't make a habit of that. I liked him and would suggest everyone to take his class.

I am a decent, kindhearted person... but I think I might hate this man. He is rude, overly opinionated, and stressful to be around. He is an idiot when it comes to technology. He just wrote a book, so prepare yourself to learn a lot about that. Actually- prepare to hear more about what he cares about than anything of importance. FRUSTRATING.
Great Professor. Very demanding class, but it's an easy "A" if you just do the reading. All of the World Lit classes have a lot of reading involved so there's no real way to get around it.

lots of quizzes, midterm, final and one paper. LOTS of reading. Professor likes to talk and talk about things he thinks are important but do not really pertain to the course. Attendance is mandatory. Take someone else if you can.
It's a really easy class, but the most boring one I've had so far. If you just read the stuff and sleep through class you'll be fine. He does tend to ramble.

This man loves to hear himself talk! He will ramble on a/b business (not english!) for the entire class making you want to shove pencils in your ears.. Also likes to push his opinions on students & tell everyone that they need to return to 9th grade english lessons. I can hear his voice in my nightmares --  unless you enjoy torture, stay away!
he is such an crazy teacher.... he rambles on and on.... i think that he is a very smart man but everything you are graded is based on his opinion.. i would not take him if you can help it.

He is a very easy professor, but he will make you want to slit your wrists. I am an English major, and he made me hate literature. He is beyond boring and rambles on about things that have nothing to do with English. If you miss less than 5 classes and write decent papers, you will make an A, but I would NOT recommend this guy to anyone.

Okay we are only half way through the semester and we just turned in our first paper , so i can't say how easy he is. But he does take attendance so you must be there everyday. Lectures are very boring, most of the time he talks about things that do not even pertain to English. He is a very sweet man, sometimes the class is just boring.

Go to class and read thats all you gotta do...there is 3 essays all easy and the easiest final ever.  Hes a good prof too hes old and smart hes done everything and half the class is him telling stories about his life...hes the smartest and most interesting person ive met take 2110 from him
